net.maidsafe.api

Class MDataPermission

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.maidsafe.api.MDataPermission

  • public class MDataPermission
extends java.lang.Object
    Exposes the API for Mutable Data permissions

      • getPermissionForUser

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<PermissionSet> getPermissionForUser(NativeHandle permissionHandle,
                                                                                  NativeHandle signKey)
        Returns the permission set for a user
        Parameters:
        permissionHandle - Permission handle as NativeHandle
        signKey - Public sign key of the user
        Returns:

      • listAll

        Fetches a list of all associated user permission sets for a Mutable Data

        Returns:

      • insert

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture insert(NativeHandle permissionHandle,
                                                     NativeHandle publicSignKey,
                                                     PermissionSet permissionSet)
        Insert a new permission set for a user.
        Parameters:
        permissionHandle - Permission handle as NativeHandle
        publicSignKey - Public sign key for the user. To insert permissions for all users pass Constants.USER_ANYONE
        permissionSet - Permission set to be assigned
